items.name: ghl-provider
items.title: GHL Provider
items.description: Context provider for GoHighLevel authentication, token management, and location context.

items.name: ghl-connect-button
items.title: GHL Connect Button
items.description: OAuth connect button for GoHighLevel authentication.

items.name: ghl-oauth-callback
items.title: GHL OAuth Callback
items.description: Callback page handler for GoHighLevel OAuth flow.

items.name: ghl-location-switcher
items.title: GHL Location Switcher
items.description: Switch between GHL locations for agency accounts.

items.name: ghl-contact-card
items.title: GHL Contact Card
items.description: Display card for a GoHighLevel contact with name, email, phone, and tags.

items.name: ghl-contact-form
items.title: GHL Contact Form
items.description: Create or edit a GoHighLevel contact with full validation.

items.name: ghl-contact-list
items.title: GHL Contact List
items.description: Scrollable list of GoHighLevel contacts with pagination.

items.name: ghl-contact-search
items.title: GHL Contact Search
items.description: Search input with typeahead for finding GoHighLevel contacts.

items.name: ghl-contact-picker
items.title: GHL Contact Picker
items.description: Modal dialog to select one or more GoHighLevel contacts.

items.name: ghl-tag-manager
items.title: GHL Tag Manager
items.description: Add and remove tags from a GoHighLevel contact with autocomplete.

items.name: ghl-webhook-handler
items.title: GHL Webhook Handler
items.description: Server-side utilities for handling GoHighLevel webhooks with signature verification.

items.name: ghl-types
items.title: GHL Types
items.description: TypeScript types for GoHighLevel entities.

items.name: ghl-time-slot-grid
items.title: GHL Time Slot Grid
items.description: Visual time slot grid component that displays available time slots in a responsive grid with grouping by time of day (morning/afternoon/evening).

items.name: ghl-availability-picker
items.title: GHL Availability Picker
items.description: Availability picker component with calendar and time slot selection. Combines date selection with available time slots from GoHighLevel.

items.name: ghl-calendar-select
items.title: GHL Calendar Select
items.description: Searchable dropdown to select a GoHighLevel calendar.

items.name: ghl-appointment-card
items.title: GHL Appointment Card
items.description: Display card for a GoHighLevel appointment with status, time, and contact info.

items.name: ghl-appointment-list
items.title: GHL Appointment List
items.description: Scrollable list of GoHighLevel appointments grouped by date.

items.name: ghl-booking-form
items.title: GHL Booking Form
items.description: Complete booking form with calendar selection, availability picker, and contact details.

items.name: ghl-channel-icon
items.title: GHL Channel Icon
items.description: Icon indicator for message channels (SMS, Email, Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, etc.).

items.name: ghl-message-bubble
items.title: GHL Message Bubble
items.description: Single message display with direction-based styling, timestamp, channel icon, and status indicators.

items.name: ghl-channel-selector
items.title: GHL Channel Selector
items.description: Dropdown selector for choosing messaging channels (SMS, Email, WhatsApp, etc.).

items.name: ghl-conversation-header
items.title: GHL Conversation Header
items.description: Header component for conversation view with contact info, channel indicator, and quick actions.

items.name: ghl-message-composer
items.title: GHL Message Composer
items.description: Message input with channel selector and send functionality using the useSendMessage hook.

items.name: ghl-conversation-thread
items.title: GHL Conversation Thread
items.description: Scrollable message thread display with auto-scroll to newest messages.

items.name: ghl-conversation-list
items.title: GHL Conversation List
items.description: Inbox view of conversations with search, filtering, unread counts, and last message preview.

items.name: ghl-pipeline-select
items.title: GHL Pipeline Select
items.description: Dropdown to select a GoHighLevel pipeline with search functionality.

items.name: ghl-opportunity-card
items.title: GHL Opportunity Card
items.description: Display card for a GoHighLevel opportunity with status, value, and stage information.

items.name: ghl-stage-selector
items.title: GHL Stage Selector
items.description: Dropdown to move an opportunity between pipeline stages with auto-move functionality.

items.name: ghl-opportunity-form
items.title: GHL Opportunity Form
items.description: Create or edit a GoHighLevel opportunity with full Zod validation.

items.name: ghl-stage-column
items.title: GHL Stage Column
items.description: A single kanban column containing opportunity cards for a pipeline stage.

items.name: ghl-opportunity-list
items.title: GHL Opportunity List
items.description: Scrollable list view of GoHighLevel opportunities with search, filtering, and pagination.

items.name: ghl-pipeline-board
items.title: GHL Pipeline Board
items.description: Full kanban board for GoHighLevel pipeline with stage columns and opportunity cards.
